title: Drawing, "Chest of Drawers (Four)", ca. 1930s
medium:
Graphite; ruled border in graphite
Support: tracing paper
markings: Stamps: Small black stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: NOTE:/COMB. #1-ZEBRA WOOD WITH CREAM LACQUER/COMB. #2.-CALIFORNIA REDWOOD BURR WITH BLACK LACQUER Inscribed in graphite in upper right: W.-B-53 Inscribed in graphite circled in lower left: 2 Inscribed in red colored pencil at lower right: P-#797
dimensions:
30 x 37.5 cm (11 13/16 x 14 3/4 in.)
Loss, UR margin
description:
Scale: 1"-1'

Four-drawer chest; top drawer narrower than other three; horizontal pulls, left and right, each drawer.
